responses.text: JH is set by the server; however, if the offline protection mod is installed on the server, as long as people in your guild do not log in, your claim should be safe.
If you are offline, enemy players cannot harm your claim.

intent: god is preventing you from claiming these lands

responses.text: This happens due to you trying to build too close to another claim or the water at the edge of map.
Try using the livemap planner to ensure you are not trying to build your monument too close to another claim.
This is perfectly fine. Players are allowed to jump into claims and attack outside of Judgment Hour as long as they use stairs, tables, or other legal structures to gain entry.
No cheating is involved if they used legitimate structures like stairs or tables to enter your base. Outside of Judgment Hour, PvP is allowed.
As long as players gain access via buildable structures (tables, stairs), killing outside of Judgment Hour is valid gameplay.

intent: buildings cannot be destroyed outside JH

responses.text: You are right, but we have an exception here: tents can be destroyed outside of Judgment Hour.
Indeed, most structures are protected outside JH, but tents and similar objects can still be destroyed.
Did you try this? [https://lifxmod.com/troubleshooting/using-yo-launcher-my-modpack-did-not-install-correctly.html]
If you've joined another server using basil mod, you may need to reinstall via yo launcher.
Check out this guide: [https://lifxmod.com/troubleshooting/mod-pack-will-not-download-and-install-using-yo-launcher.html] for help.
